trans-unit.source: Turns just-in-time (JIT) activation on or off.
trans-unit.target: Slår utelukkende tidsnok (JIT) aktivering av eller på.

trans-unit.source: If JIT activation is specified, then it must not be disabled in the COM+ catalog, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: Hvis JIT-aktivering er angitt, må deretter den ikke være deaktivert i COM +-katalogen, og omvendt.

trans-unit.source: If enabled in the COM+ catalog, it must be specified on the component.
trans-unit.target: Hvis aktivert i COM +-katalogen, må være angitt for komponenten.

trans-unit.source: JIT activation defaults to off for components which are configured in COM+, but is enabled automatically if automatic transactions are requested.
trans-unit.target: JIT aktivering standard av for komponenter som er konfigurert i COM +, men aktiveres automatisk hvis automatiske transaksjoner forespørres.

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du bruker attributter [attributter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.JustInTimeActivationAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.JustInTimeActivationAttribute"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor enables just-in-time (JIT) activation.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.JustInTimeActivationAttribute"></xref> class, optionally allowing the disabling of just-in-time (JIT) activation by passing <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> as the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.JustInTimeActivationAttribute"> </xref> klassen tillater eventuelt deaktivering av utelukkende tidsnok (JIT) aktivering ved å sende <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> som parameter.

trans-unit.source: JIT activation is required and `val` cannot be set to `false` if the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption> value for the transaction is `Supported`, `Required`, or `RequiresNew`.
trans-unit.target: JIT aktivering kreves og `val` kan ikke settes til `false` hvis den <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption>verdi transaksjonen `Supported`, `Required`, eller `RequiresNew`.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable JIT activation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>aktivere JIT aktivering. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.JustInTimeActivationAttribute"></xref> setting.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if JIT activation is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis JIT-aktivering er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
